post_message: An Albuquerque Police spokesperson says that a homeowner awoke to noise in his house and grabbed a firearm, thinking there was possibly an intruder. The homeowner checked the house and found a man, identified as 28-year-old Robert Bartley, crouching in his kitchen holding what the man said "appeared to be knife." According to police, Bartley approached the homeowner saying he was going to kill him.
